scripts.dev:client: npx cross-env RUN_ENV=dev npx webpack-dev-server --progress --colors --config build/webpack.dev.config.js
scripts.build:dev: npx cross-env RUN_ENV=dev OPEN_PROXY=false npx webpack --progress --colors --config build/webpack.prod.config.js
scripts.build:test: npx cross-env RUN_ENV=test npx webpack --progress --colors --config build/webpack.prod.config.js
scripts.build:prod: npx cross-env RUN_ENV=prod npx webpack --progress --colors --config build/webpack.prod.config.js
